head.title: AMAZON.COM TO OPEN FRENCH WEB SITE

hedline.hl1: AMAZON.COM TO OPEN FRENCH WEB SITE

abstract.p: Amazon.com will open a French-language Web site, selling books, music and videos. The new site, Amazon.fr, is the company's third venture outside the United States (S)

block.p: The online retailer Amazon.com will open a French-language Web site, selling books, music and videos. The new site, Amazon.fr, is the company's third venture outside the United States, after online stores for Britain and Germany. A spokeswoman said the company hoped to serve French speakers outside of France as well. Amazon.com, based in Seattle, will operate the French site from offices in Guyancourt and a distribution center in Orleans. Separately, Amazon.com announced that it had expanded its marketing alliance with America Online. No terms were disclosed.
